value: Mutual Fund are a capital market product and are NOT the product of PT Bank Central Asia Tbk (BCA) and BCA shall not be responsible for any claims and risks arising from the management of your Mutual Fund portfolio. BCA only acts as a Mutual Fund Selling Agent.

Any investment in a Mutual Fund does NOT constitute part of third party deposits at BCA, so it is not guaranteed by BCA and is NOT WITHIN the scope of the deposit insurance program by the Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation (LPS). Every Mutual Fund product chosen and purchased by a (prospective) Investor constitutes the (prospective) Investor's own decision and sole responsibility, including if the (prospective) Investor chooses a product type that does not fit the risk profile of the (prospective) Investor. The past performance of a Mutual Fund does not guarantee its future performance.
The (prospective) Investor must read and understand the prospectus of a Mutual Fund before deciding to invest in a Mutual Fund.
BCA and the Investment Manager of the Mutual Fund offered by BCA are registered with and supervised by the Financial Services Authority.
The sale of Mutual Fund at BCA is done by BCA's employees as Mutual Fund Selling Agent Representatives (WAPERD), who are registered with and supervised by the Financial Services Authority.
The confirmation of the Investor's investment in a Mutual Fund that is issued by the Custodian Bank constitutes a valid proof of ownership.
